channel.title: [Class Suggestion]The Mailman , A New Leader for The Unseen!
channel.description:
> # [color=purple]The Mailman[/color] > **[color=purple]Unseen Special[/color]** > > **Passive (Special Delivery)** - The First time you get Investigated , you will appear as not suspicious.(This applies to every **Investigative** class' first check) > **Passive (Letter Stack)** - Immune to Death at Night. You are Immune to Most Occupation and Redirection. You will appear as not occupation/redirection Immune. > > **Night Ability (Promotion!)** - Promote one of your **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** to become **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]**.(Unlimited Uses - Can target yourself if you are the last **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** member alive) > ^ *Optional: This will only be available after N3.* > > **Night Ability (Convert)** - Convert a player to **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]**.(Infinite Uses - [1 Day Cooldown] - There may only be 4 living members at a time) > **Night Ability (Blackmail)** - Select a player. That player will be unable to speak and vote tomorrow.(Infinite Uses) > ^ *Optional: You will hear the target if they try to whisper/talk. If you up someone , they will up them too. Their votes won't count if they up someone by themselves. Possible 1 day cooldown?* > **Goal: **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]'s Goal.****
> If **[color=purple]The Mailman[/color]** is the leader of **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** , there will be no **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** unless **Promotion** is used. The oldest **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** member will become **[color=purple]The Mailman[/color]**(Until N4). If **[color=purple]The Mailman[/color]** has died , The oldest **[color=purple]Unseen[/color]** member will become **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]** with 3 uses of **Distract** and 2 uses of **Nightshade** (Unless someone is already **[color=purple]The Assassin[/color]**).
> This class was made to help **[color=purple]The Unseen[/color]** gather as much information as possible. Feedback is welcome!

item.title: [Class Suggestion]The Mailman , A New Leader for The Unseen!
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

“5th Change : Name Change”

Not a change. Just pointless flavor. Just like how Unseen’s new HD portrait wasn’t a rework either

NAOtheRitualist:

3rd Change : Increased member limit to 4.

Not a change to the class. Faction != Faction member

Read full topic
